title: Director's cut
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health

abstract: My time as Director of Positive Women.
description: Stephanie reflects on her time as director of Positive Women, a support and advocacy organisation for women with HIV. She is inspired by the courage of the women who must come to terms  with a disease that can kill them or significantly reduce their quality of life.
